Name: TileDynasty FPS Arena
About the game: Set in an Apocalyptic World, you play as a renegade with incredible endurance and speed, demolishing enemies with arcade like weapons. TileDynasty is an FPS Arena, where Players can work together against AI Enemies or go head-to-head accomplishing objectives within each game mode. WEAPONS GRENADE LAUNCHER RIFLE MACHINE GUN ROCKET LAUNCHER PORTER GUN MOVEMENT: Designed for fluid-like motion, coupled with Wall Movement, use multiple approaches to get to different platforms to your strategy! LEVELS: Maps will be designed to tailor to the 'Arcade-Feel' of the game CURRENT MODES: SEARCH AND RESCUE: Locate the hostages in each map and escort them back to the rescue zone, and defend the hostages from the enemy TEAM DEATH MATCH: Head-To-Head online with friends or against AI
